Wow, is this like the third faction to be named Destructicons?


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> OOC: oops i forgot about Airazor
> 
> :::Airazor/Devil Gigatron/Drancron/Elphaorpha/Rartorarta:::
> 
> ::Airazor heads to the meeting room and sits down::
> --------------------------------------------------------------------
----------
> 
> ---------------------------------------------
> ::Devil Gigatron flies around earth, and eventually finds three 
damaged 
> stasis pods.  He made them each scan two animals for beast modes.  
The three 
> new warriors emerged they were Drancron, Elphaorpha, and 
Rartorarta.  They 
> transformed into robot modes and look to Devil Gigatron::
> Devil Gigatron:  Welcome my comrades.  I am Devil Gigatron, your 
leader.
> Drancron: Why should we trust you?
> Elphaorpha: Yeah, you just bring us online and immeadiatly expect 
us to 
> follow you?
> Rartorarta:  We will not follow you without something in return.
> Devil Gigatron:  Fine then.  I promise to pay you for every bot you 
kill.
> ::a smile crossed the faces of the three mercenaries.  Money.  
Power.  That 
> was good enough for them::
> Drancron: We'll take it.
> Devil Gigatron: Good.  Now come in to my lair and we shall plot our 
next move.
> ::The Destructicons had been formed!::
